info.title: CryptoPulse API
info.description: Powerful, fast, and reliable API for real-time cryptocurrency conversions into fiat currencies or other crypto assets. Aggregates multiple data providers (CoinMarketCap and CoinPaprika) for high availability and accurate rates. Supports 5,000+ cryptocurrencies and multiple fiat currencies. Handles crypto-to-fiat, fiat-to-crypto, and crypto-to-crypto conversions with automatic fallback. TTL caching for faster responses. Get real-time crypto prices from top exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and KuCoin.

get.description: Returns the current price of a cryptocurrency against a fiat currency or another cryptocurrency. Aggregates data from CoinMarketCap and CoinPaprika for reliability.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: Cryptocurrency symbol, e.g.: BTC, ETH, SOL, BNB, XRP, DOGE

parameters.name: fiat
parameters.description: Target fiat or crypto currency, e.g.: USD, EUR, COP, MXN, ARS, PEN, BRL

get.description: Converts an amount from one currency to another. Supports crypto-to-fiat, fiat-to-crypto, and crypto-to-crypto conversions. Automatically falls back to CoinPaprika if CoinMarketCap fails, ensuring high availability.

parameters.name: from_symbol
parameters.description: Source currency symbol, e.g.: BTC, ETH, USD, EUR

parameters.name: to_symbol
parameters.description: Target currency symbol, e.g.: USD, EUR, ETH, BTC

parameters.name: debug
parameters.description: Optional flag for detailed diagnostic output

get.description: Returns a list of supported cryptocurrencies and fiat currencies. Useful for dropdown menus, auto-complete fields, or validation in your application.
